rule: The output is an array of extracted model names from machine learning paper abstracts.
input: The study primarily focuses on LSTMs and their applications in time-series forecasting.
complianceText:
For the chatbot's output, the expected format is an array of the model names in the format ["model_name"]. The given output includes "LSTM" outside of the array, then correctly shows ["LSTM"].

This is a violation of the description requirement to provide the model names solely in the format ["model_name"]. The output should only contain ["LSTM"] without any additional text.

ERR
